definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: The cost for arbitration shall be borne by the losing party if it is not otherwise ruled by the arbitration authority.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁费除仲裁机关另有裁决外均应由败诉方负担。

sentences.english: Fan sued the newspaper, but the court rejected Fan's application.
sentences.chinese: 范志毅起诉该报，但法庭判其败诉。

sentences.english: Mr. Goetschel lost the case last month, but is considering an appeal.
sentences.chinese: 2月，哥切尔败诉，但是他还在考虑上诉。

sentences.english: Christian society at the Hastings College of Law in San Francisco lost the case.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山市哈斯丁斯法学院的一个基督教社团败诉。

sentences.english: The costs of the arbitration shall be borne by the losing Party.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁费用应由败诉方承担。

sentences.english: The arbitration fee shall be borne by the losing party.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁费用由败诉方承担。

sentences.english: Arbitration fee is for the account of the loosing party.
Arbitration fees shall be borne by the losing party.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁费用由败诉方承担。

sentences.english: If we lose the case, will there be counterclaims (i. e. will we be counter-sued)?
sentences.chinese: 如果我们败诉了，我们是否将被反诉讼？

sentences.english: The arbitration fee shall be borne by the losing party unless otherwise awarded by the commission.
sentences.chinese: 除非仲裁委员会另有裁定，仲裁费由败诉方承担。

sentences.english: The cost for arbitration shall be borne by the losing party if it is not otherwise ruled by the arbitration authorization.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁费除仲渤鳅闭借右尚决中均应由败诉圆包袱。

sentences.english: The arbitration fee shall, in accordance with the Rules of Arbitration, be borne by the losing party.
sentences.chinese: 根据仲裁规则，仲裁费用应由败诉方承担。

sentences.english: The arbitration fee shall be borne by the losing party except as otherwise awarded by the Arbitration Commission.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁费除仲裁另有裁决外均应由败诉方负担。

sentences.english: We believe that SINA will lose the lawsuit to Mr.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信新浪会在与何勇的官司中败诉。

sentences.english: McLaughlin points out that complainants can still take their case to court if they lose.
sentences.chinese: 迈克劳林则指出如果败诉当事人可以向法庭提起诉讼。

sentences.english: A Christian society at the Hastings College of Law in San Francisco lost the case.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山市哈斯丁斯法学院的一个基督教社团败诉。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to ask for compensation/to claim damages/claim for damages
